mapper.select: select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC

select R.REPLY_NO, R.BOARD_NO, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_DATE from reply R join member M on R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where R.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} order by REPLY_DATE

select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
